resources.string:
Coming soon. Pages dispatched through CodeMessaging can be delivered without incurring text messaging fees. And received on Android tablets. Stay tuned for further details
 
 What"'"s new in this release
 
 Restored WRITE_SMS permission that was removed in v1.4.45. Thanks for reminding me why it was needed.
 
 New Locations:
 Jackson County, IN
 Erie County, NY
 
 Location Parsing Fixes:
 Litchfield, CT
 Tolland County, CT
 Carol County, MD
 St Marys County, MD
 Hennepin County, MN
 Iredell County, NC
 Chester County, PA
 Oconee County, SC
 Eau Claire, WI
 Franklin County, VA
 
 General fixes:
 
 Wrong payment status report when user has paid subscription and is using a sponsored location
 
 More little improvements have been made to the way we generate the search string sent to Google Maps.
